entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 01:01 AM MST Sunday 08 January 2023
